text: Edward M. Bruner (September 28, 1924 â€“ August 7, 2020) was an American anthropologist and educator. He was born in New York City. He worked at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. His book Culture on Tour: Ethnographies of Travel was his best-known book. His works focused on Toba Batak migrants in Indonesia in the 1960s. Bruner died on August 7, 2020 in Urbana, Illinois at the age of 95.Edward Bruner obituary ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American anthropologists Category:University of Illinois faculty Category:Scientists from Urbana, Illinois Category:Writers from Urbana, Illinois Category:Writers from New York City
title: Edward Bruner
